qas.question: how do isps provide internet access?

answers.text: a range of technologies to connect users to their network

qas.question: what is one type of technology used to connect to the internet?
what type of technology is used to connect to the internet wirelessly?
what was an earlier technology used to connect to the internet?
What old technology was unable to be used to connect to the Internet?
What technology is used to connect the Internet through wires?
Computer motherboards are used to do what?

context: <b5_0>ISPs<b5_0/> provide <a0_0>Internet access<a0_0/>, employing <a1_0>a range of technologies to <b8_0>connect users to their network<b8_0/><a1_0/>. Available technologies have ranged from computer modems with acoustic couplers to <a4_0><b6_0>telephone lines<b6_0/><a4_0/>, to <a2_0>television cable (CATV)<a2_0/>, <a3_0><b7_0>wireless Ethernet (wi-fi)<a3_0/>, and fiber optics<b7_0/>.
